title: Video-Based Authentic Language Teaching Methodology Design

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic language teaching methodologies and instructional design
context.additional_context: Enhancing video-based learning design competencies for in-service secondary language teachers, applicable to real educational settings.

learning_goals: Instructional design can be concretely structured using video materials that reflect actual language classroom scenarios
Authentic language learning environments can be designed by applying learner-video interaction strategies
Improvement strategies for video-based instructional design can be proposed through peer feedback and mentoring
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
